title: Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**. If game doesn't launch try setting the .exe from sliders menu.
description: Murder. Gods. Romance. Band practice? Unravel the mystery of the Last Museâ€™s death in an interactive roleplaying musical where Greek gods live hidden among us. Use your newfound powers of musical persuasion to choose how this wry and moving saga will unfold. How will the curtain fall?
